snippet: When Armenia’s team returned home from the Chess Olympiad, its members were greeted by the president and treated to a parade in the capital.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain notes that the Armenian team won the gold medal in the Chess Olympiad in Istanbul, led by the world's number two player Levon Aronian.
lead_paragraph: When Armenia’s team returned home from the Chess Olympiad, its members were greeted by the president and treated to a parade in the capital.

headline.seo: Chess: Armenia Wins Gold at Olympiad
headline.main: World’s No. 2 Player Leads Armenia to a Gold Medal
headline.print_headline: World’s No. 2 Player Leads Armenia to a Gold Medal
